skins.selfIntroduction: I am Formidable, third ship of the Illustrious class. I operated in the Mediterranean for a time, crossing swords with a certain Veneto. Thereafter, I found myself all across the Seven Seas. While my service record is not particularly impressive, I feel I made a small contribution to the war effort.
skins.acquisition: Good day, Commander. I am Formidable, third ship of the Illustrious class. Pleased to make your acquaintance.
skins.details: ?! ... Ah, I was just doing a bit of tidying up. Please, come right in.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, if you're not making any progress on your work, why not take a break? I've prepared tea and crumpets.
skins.secretaryIdle2: No harm in taking a rest while the Commander's distC Heavens! Victorious! G-good day. Do you have some business with the Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle3: On the day of my launch, hmm... What a shame... though I didn't do it on purpose... Well! All water under the bridge now, isn't it?
skins.secretaryTouch: I must admit, Tirpitz is quite the hard nut to crack.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, is this the appropriate way for one to behave?

skins.shipDescription: A Lady of the Royal Navy exudes elegance even when wearing her swimsuit. Huh...? Y-you're not seeing it? Really... that's weird...
skins.acquisition: A Lady of the Royal Navy exudes elegance even when wearing her swimsuit. Huh...? Y-you're not seeing it? Really... that's weird...
skins.details: Are you done warming up, Commander? Right then, into the water with you?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Don't you find the atmosphere rather dreary...? What if we put on some rock... Er, something a little more stimulating?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hmm, that would be Hood. Even in a swimsuit she's the picture of nobility. Of course, that's nothing I'm not incapable of...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Don't fret, Warspite. I wouldn't be able to swim without the Commander's help either!
skins.secretaryTouch: Huh? Illustrious?! Grr... You tricked me, Commander. Now you're in for it!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Okay, I see how it is. The salty sea air has gotten you all frisky, Commander. Hehehe...
